reviewText: I give it 5 stars because of The Band eventhough the movie can best be described as "cheesy."
I love The Band so of course I love this movie!
At first I didn't think it was going to be good, but as it went forward I enjoyed it. Great to see Rick Danko,Levon Helm& Garth Hudson from the Band

This movie was filmed right here in Northwest Arkansas where I have lived my whole life. I still remember the hullabaloo when it was being made.  The plot is thick, the acting is incredible and the story is brilliant!  While it didn't get much publicity, everyone who has seen it watched it at least one more time.
Going to be honest.  Not a great movie; but when 4 out of 5 members of the group THE BAND are in it....I'll watch it.

Arrived early & in the condition promised - Good flick for  " THE  BAND "  fans !!

(  Of course , No Robbie  Robertson !!  )

I want my movie, my name is in the credits and I gave up a typical corporation raise so I could get my name in the credits. My parents haven't seen the movie yet and I would like them too before they lose all their natural teeth.
